name: Dice Warrior (itch)
description:
You are the legendary dice warrior, master of one move and one move only. The Rolling Dice, fight through the mysterious dungeons of Dice, where each chamber is random and each encounter might bless you or curse your warrior path.

Controls (Keyboard/Gamepad)

W + Mouse/Left Stick = Move and Turn

Left Mouse Click/A = Roll n' Dice
